title: WTS/WTT: Gabby Street PRINTER'S SCRAP SGC color variation
author: mrvster

posts.post_title: WTS/WTT: Gabby Street PRINTER'S SCRAP SGC color variation
posts.post_content:
Hello all!

A beautiful Gabby Street Classic "yellow / brown "  NO PRINT  Fact # 30 SGC GRADED AS COLOR VARIATION!!....looking to trade or sell ...I have many printers scraps and looking to diversify...

THESE WERE PRINTED WITH BROADLEAF 460'S! and are just as rare!:eek:

rumor- the stained ones survived a fire at a card shop in the 70's....can not confirm this though...

looking to sell for $1300.00   or trade toward/ for 206 cobbs  green, , red,  bat on or bat off...

or , lets negotiate!:)


[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url] or pm me

thanks 

johnny

better scans on request

I always like looking at these color variation scraps and plan to add some to my collection at some point. I don't have much to trade and cash is tight right now. I only have the SC 350-460 Factory 30 Full Color No Print Scraps to trade. It only makes sense for me to collect the yellow/browns since they were on one sheet and the color one's that I have were on the other sheet. It may have even been the same person that took both of the sheets from the print shop and cut them into singles. All I can do is fantasize of the many possibilities that these cards took to get where they are today.

but no takers yet.....

anyone have a 206 cobb toward trade?????????????????????

THIS IS SGC GRADED! color variation.....


lets negotiate:D
Great card !! Good luck with the sale !!

Thanks my friend....

great card here.....lets negotiate!

these cards are drying up! only 2 in REA similar scrap....
